timeline.bodyText: why close the tlog? The merge on L71 won't get persisted. Is that intentional?
timeline.author: MikeDombo

replies.bodyText:
Yes. After merge, the full config will only be persisted to target.tlog.
Earlier if anything fails between config merge and launch dir setup https://github.com/aws/aws-greengrass-nucleus/blob/8b5037b16ac9b44ccbc611ec6c0bf47b58e178f1/src/main/java/com/aws/greengrass/deployment/activator/KernelUpdateActivator.java#L72-L76, nucleus will start into the new config.tlog without executing the remaining parts of the deployment. When it gets notified of the same deployment later, it will appear to have no change in the config
replies.author: hui-yang
